title: News digest [No. 10]
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: “Look no waves” - ‘surfing’ on skates at Sandringham. “White Harvest” - of 25,000 tons of salt from Lake Tyrrell. “Imitation realist” - exhibition of assemblages by Colin Lanceley, includes “Shoot the Piano Player” and “Reliquary”. Samoyeds’ hair spun with wool and knitted. “Jumping jacks”- at the Victorian Trampolining Championships showing grace and skill.
